game.name: Blackhole on the Road
game.genres: 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 스포츠, 전략
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 캡션 이용 가능, 코멘터리 제공, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Blackhole on the Road is a thrilling game that puts you in control of a powerful black hole as you compete against others to become the largest and most powerful in the city.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Blackhole on the Road is a thrilling game that puts you in control of a powerful black hole as you compete against others to become the largest and most powerful in the city.
